velinov.java.ivybus

Interface IvyBusNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventDispatchable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsIvyBusNode, JoystickBusNode, RealDroneBusNode, VirtualDroneBusNode

    public interface IvyBusNode
extends EventDispatchable
    an interface to describe a basic node on the Ivy-bus.
    Since:
    07.04.2015
    Author:
    Vladimir Velinov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String IVY_NODE_CONNECTED
      a property-key, that is fired when the IvyBusNode gets connected to the bus.
      static java.lang.String IVY_NODE_DISCONNECTED
      a property-key, that is fired when the IvyBusNode disconnects from the bus.
      static java.lang.String IVY_NODE_FAILED
      a property-key that is fired when the IvyBus fails to connect to the bus.
      static java.lang.String IVY_SUBSCRIBE_ERROR
      a property-key that is fired when the IvyBus fails to subscribe to a message.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_RECEIVED
      a property that is fired when a Message has been received.
